featured.text: For example, John Steinbeck is (27) to have been an excellent listener, yet he was hated by some of the people he wrote about.

definition.zh_def: 史坦貝克（John Steinbeck）是美國著名的小說家，以其對社會問題的深刻洞察和對普通人生活的描寫而聞名。
definition.en_def: John Steinbeck was an American novelist known for his profound insights into social issues and his portrayal of the lives of ordinary people.
definition.example: John Steinbeck wrote 'The Grapes of Wrath,' which highlights the struggles of migrant workers during the Great Depression.
